entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `MemberNotNullWhen` does not report "Member must have a non-null value when exiting when" when expression is returned #70398
  • Debugging issue with identically named files #70393

Closed

  • Collection expressions fail at runtime with ImmutableArray #70351
    17.9
  • Report diagnostic for collection expression with collection initializer target type where Add() returns a value #69136
    17.9
  • Missing error for interceptors for dynamic calls #70321
    17.9
  • RValue receivers are improperly spilled in some scenarios #70356
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34216.32 #70394
  • Missing CS0177 (unassigned out params) if method calls a local function #70391
  • Interceptor for non-existent methods? #70317
    Backlog
  • Analyzer assembly load failure has too generic message #70148

PullRequests

Created

  • Separate build and test phases in integration tests #70400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add refactoring to convert a primary-constructor-parameter to a normal constructor. #70399
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution (#70328) #70395
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8

Merged

  • Collection expressions - error when we can't emit good codegen for ImmutableArray #70384
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify and improve performance of NameGenerator.EnsureUniqueness methods #70373
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify checksum caching code. #70346
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure rValue receiver is properly captured if there is an await in call arguments #70362
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Replace debug-only assertion with release check to fail fast #70380
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70378
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • File types need to account for pathmap #70322
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Deprecate API and add NFW telemetry for it #70365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Trying to fix integration tests #70371
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Faster checksum syncing for documents. #70385
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix emitting Custom Attribute deltas #70350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Document deviations from the C# standard #70121
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesized list types should implement ICollection and IList #70288
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged
